entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
